size_estimate.values: ? - unknown; 0.1 - small and relatively easy to get done; 0.1; 0.3; 0.5; 1.0 - the same as most of other tasks; 1 ; 1.5; 2.0; 3.0; 5.0  - five times bigger and harder than others
? - unknown; 0.1 - small and relatively easy to get done; 0.1; 0.3; 0.5; 1.0 - the same as most of other tasks; 1 ; 1.5; 2.0; 3.0; 5.0  - five times bigger and harder than others

workflow_stages.name: Ready for Development
workflow_stages.description:
Requirement has been defined, including any UX design needed, and including salient test cases. 

At least one conversation has happened between business, dev and QA. 

Business, dev, and QA have all confirmed they're happy with the requirements including the tests.

 (these rules don't apply to cards in the maintenance lane)

workflow_stages.name: Ready for Code Review
workflow_stages.description:
Unit tests done for Ruby.
Manual testing done

workflow_stages.name: Ready for Test
workflow_stages.description: code has been reviewed and all required changes are done

workflow_stages.name: Ready to Deploy
workflow_stages.full_name: Business Owner Testing / Ready to Deploy
workflow_stages.description: results of test cases should be present in card (body or comments) before moving to here

workflow_stages.name: Live Verification
workflow_stages.description: Verification after deploy by non-developer that change has been deployed as is working.

swimlanes.name: Roadmap
swimlanes.description: Planned work relating to the development roadmap

tasks.name: promos at bottom of casino & games page are only of type casino
tasks.description:
as a marketing manager

I want to restict the promo cards that we display at the end of the casino and games pages to exclude sportsbook promos

so that I show the most relevant promos


scenarios


    player has many promo cards ✔

GIVEN a player with many promo cards tagged as sportsbook and many promo cards tagged as casino

WHEN I visit the casino page (or games page)

THEN I see two promo cards below the games grid

AND both cards are one that are tagged as casino


    player has only one casino promo card ✔

GIVEN a player with many promo cards tagged as sportsbook and only one promo cards tagged as casino

WHEN I visit the casino page (or games page)

THEN I see only one promo cards below the games grid

AND it is the card that is tagged as casino


    player has no casino promo card ✔

GIVEN a player with many promo cards tagged as sportsbook and no promo cards tagged as casino

WHEN I visit the casino page (or games page)

THEN I see no promo cards below the games grid
tasks.size_estimate_description: 1.0 - the same as most of other tasks
search_tags: promos at bottom of casino & games page are only of type casino

tasks.name: user can filter promo cards in my-promos
tasks.description:
as a player

I want to filter promo cards by for example "sportsbook" or "casino"

so that I can more easily find promos that I might want when there are very many promos available


This card assumes that already a marketing administrator can tag promo templates with product tags like "sportsbook" or "casino". A template can have none, one, or more tags.


UI for the filter here:

https://www.figma.com/file/VfN0izK0n10XG7Ht7nwtEo/Promos?node-id=0%3A1



Scenarios


context (applies to all scenarios)

GIVEN a player who has many promo cards available to him

including one "NO_TAGS" from a template that has no product tags

and one "JUST_CASINO" from a template that has casino product tag only

and one "JUST_SB" from a template that has sportsbook product tag only

and one "BOTH" from a template that has both casino and sportsbook tags

and one "PT_BONUS" from a Playtech bonus



    default all ✔

WHEN the player visits my-promos

THEN he sees all five above mentioned promo cards


    just casino ✔

WHEN the player visits my-promos

AND clicks on the "Casino Only" filter on the UI

THEN he sees promo cards including:  

    JUST_CASINO, BOTH, PT_BONUS

AND he does NOT see promo cards:

    NO_TAGS or JUST_SB


    just sportsbook ✔

WHEN the player visits my-promos

AND clicks on the "Sportsbook Only" filter on the UI

THEN he sees promo cards including:  

    JUST_SB, BOTH

AND he does NOT see promo cards:

    NO_TAGS, JUST_CASINO, or PT_BONUS


QA Testing = Passed
tasks.size_estimate_description: 1.0 - the same as most of other tasks
search_tags: user can filter promo cards in my-promos

tasks.name: Data import retry-ability
tasks.description:
as a marketing manager

I want to be able to retry an import when it fails before data translation

so that I can avoid unnecessary manual work


scenarios


GIVEN a big import is currently running

AND a error occurs in the middle of the data import step

AS a marketing manager

WHEN I go to the Optimove imports dashboard

THEN there is no import entry for today

AND no data was imported

AND the import is automatically retried - PASS


WHEN the retried import finishes successfully

THEN there is a successful import entry on the Optimove imports dashboard for today

AND there is no duplicate data imported in the database - PASS
tasks.size_estimate_description: 0.1 - small and relatively easy to get done

tasks.name: Make data translation step atomic
tasks.description:
as a marketing manager

I want to avoid partial data translation and any further step related to that data
so that I avoid unnecessary manual work

and avoid a stop of the import process for the other successfully translated data


scenarios


GIVEN i have configured Optimove such 2 groups are imported (target_group, action_id pairs) - (4 Groups PASS)

AND i have configured 1 bonus for each group - PASS

AND i have configured a recurring campaign template for the group - PASS
AND a successful run of the import - PASS

AS a marketing manager

WHEN i inspect the groups created for today - PASS

THEN i see both groups with all configured members - PASS

AND i see all clients in the groups got the configured bonus - PASS

AND i see there is a mailshot entry in the mailshot dashboard for the 2 groups - PASS


GIVEN an import is running

AND data import step runs successfully 

AND i have configured Optimove such that 2 groups will be created

AS a developer

WHEN I go to the Sidekiq dashboard 

THEN I can see 2 jobs for data translation in the Optimove queue 

AND the jobs are not running in parallel


GIVEN i have configured Optimove such that 2 groups will be created
AND an import is running

AND data import runs successfully

AND 2 data translation jobs are queued

AND 1 data translation job is running

AS a developer

WHEN i restart Sidekiq and wait for the queue to finish processing

THEN i see that both groups were created with the expected members
tasks.size_estimate_description: 1.0 - the same as most of other tasks

as a marketing manager

I want to receive information about bonusing at the end of an import

AND a finished successful import 

AND 9 bonuses are issued

AND 1 playtech bonus fails due to a suspended client

AS a developer

WHEN i check graylog

THEN i see an entry for all 10 bonus issuing attempts and metdata for the one that failed


QA Testing = Passed

tasks.name: Handle unknown state of Playtech transfer
tasks.description:
We need to notify people if we get an error while processing a Playtech Transfer where we don’t know if the distributed “transaction” is complete.


The first “leg” is we do a withdrawal to take money out of the player’s SIA account, and the second leg is to call Playtech to do a deposit of same amount into the player’s poker wallet.


In interaction TransferFundsToCasino we don’t rescue some exceptions, including a HTTP read timeout. In the case of a HTTP read timeout on the call to Playtech we should notify people that they need to check Playtech’s systems and if the deposit is not there then they should reverse the withdrawal on our side.


email template and recipient list for notification is below.


Also for other general failures to process the second leg, where we are uncertain of the outcome, we should notify people. Same email template as above. Perhaps after the more specific rescues we should rescue any standard error in TransferFundsToCasino#execute and if we have the withdrawal_id then mail explaining that we have taken funds from SIA wallet but possibly not given them to Playtech Poker Wallet. It we don’t have a withdrawal_id then handle as normal technical error. Then possibly re-raise (I’m not sure what Rails or Homer conventions are here).




To: rtobin@fusioneer.com; accreports@sportsinteraction.com; teamleaders@sportsinteraction.com

From: ptfails@sportsinteraction.com

Subject:

Error occurred processing Transfer to Playtech Poker Wallet.

Body:

An error occurred processing transfer to Playtech poker wallet for customer %cliend_id% (%username%)

Withdrawal leg with ID %withdrawal_id% was processed to take %transfer_amount% from their SIA account.

The deposit leg with external transaction ID %external_transactoin_id% into Playtech might have succeeded, or might have failed.

@Payments: please check the Playtech system and reverse the withdrawal if the deposit did not succeed.

@CS: please note the account that there is a possible missing transfer and notify the player that our Payments Team will investigate and resolve and discrepancy within 1 business day.
tasks.size_estimate_description: 1.0 - the same as most of other tasks
search_tags: Handle unknown state of Playtech transfer

tasks.name: Bonus info when zero rollover
tasks.description:
Problem: The Playtech bonus cards only have one configuration and it means that what shows does not make too much sense for Zero Rollover bonuses (free spins and golden chips mainly).



Proposed Solution: When there is no Rollover associated then don’t show that bottom bit (as shown in screenshot).


Scenarios


GIVEN a user logged in with a "Free Spins" bonus

AND I go to promos page

THEN I don't see the extra info for rollover bonuses

tasks.name: Admin control of PT bonus card images and Heading text
tasks.description:
as a marketing admin

I want to be able to configure the title and image of bonus cards

such that Players can differentiate between different types of bonuses more easily


Scenarios


title: 


Run scenario for each of the following types of playtech bonuses: Freespins /  golden chips / other(example cash)


GIVEN I am an admin within the marketing group

AND I have configured a <free spins/ golden chips/ other> bonus in playtech

WHEN I go to the bonus terms admin panel

AND I create a new bonus term with the template name configured above

AND I click create bonus terms buttonb

THEN I see two fields Title(English) and Title(French) with default values

    <Free Spins / Golden Chips / Casino Bonus> and <Lancers gratuits /  Jetons dor\u00e9s / Bonus Casino > 

AND I can edit the titles and update it successfully - PASS


GIVEN I have configured a bonus in playtech

AND i have created a bonus term with custom titles

AND I have awarded a client the configured bonus

AND the player has approved the bonus

WHEN I go to the players promo page

THEN I see the custom <english / french> title i have configured - PASS


image:


GIVEN I have configured a bonus in playtech

AND i have created a bonus term

AND I left the image field empty

AND I have awarded a client the configured bonus

AND the player has approved the bonus

WHEN I go to the players promo page

THEN I see the old image used in bonus promo cards - PASS


GIVEN I have configured a bonus in playtech

AND i have created a bonus term

AND I uploaded a image in the image field

AND I have awarded a client the configured bonus

AND the player has approved the bonus

WHEN I go to the players promo page

THEN I see my uploaded image at the background top of the card - PASS

tasks.name: Promo Card Filtered Promo Content
tasks.description:
problem: drop-down lists  of all promo content when editing a promo card will be too big in production (over 3,000 entries in production)



To make it easier to work with we will add a Promo Content Filter field to the "edit promo card form" that will filter the options in the drop-downs for the input fields:


Also we will restrict choice of Promo content to those with promo content subtype of 3 for the image and of subtype 1 or 2 for the other fields
tasks.size_estimate_description: 1.0 - the same as most of other tasks

tasks.description:
In the same page in homer admin where you can edit a promo card, you can view the translated assets of that card.


For each promo content record selected the corresponding asset in the each language will be displayed, read-only.


Note, this is not a full preview of how the card will display on the page, it is a view of the raw image URLs and HTML assets translated.

At most one bonus should be awarded 


Returning to deposit form does not offer bonus again


Only award bonus if still eligible by the time the deposit completes


Test two deposit requests where they have different choices of bonus and where the first deposit completes after the second request is made but before the second request completes. The bonus awarded should be based on the last choice.


-- verify last bonus choice is used to apply bonus

request interac bonus A

request paysafecard bonus B

complete interac

verify get bonus B


-- verify last bonus choice is used to apply bonus

request interac bonus A

request paysafecard with "no thanks" as bonus choice

complete interac

verify get no bonus


  verify don't get two bonuses

request interac bonus A

request paysafecard bonus B

complete interac

verify get bonus B

complete paysafecard

verify no bonus

tasks.name: New PT Bonus type
tasks.description:
We need to add a new ‘bonus type’ to this section of homer:


https://admin-homer.sportsia.com/admin/optimove/playtech/bonuses/new/

Currently we have Cash, Deposit, Free Spins and Golden Chips. 


We need an additional one called ‘PT Tag’, This needs to behave the same was as a Deposit Type.


It also needs to be visible on the Edit pages and the bonus list page  https://admin-homer.sportsia.com/admin/optimove/playtech/bonuses/
tasks.size_estimate_description: 1.0 - the same as most of other tasks

tasks.name: Promo Card CRUD
tasks.description:
new entity "promo card" will eventually replace the promos cards currently configured in old admin.


This card is to add support in Homer Admin to be able to create, view, edit, and delete new-style promo cards.


Promo cards have a unique name.


Promo cards contain the following fields:


  image
  heading
  subheading
  main text
  button
  terms [optional] 


The fields, apart from name, are set by looking and choosing existing Promo Content records, which have already been created in old admin. This can be a drop-down of all promo content records for this story. Drop down lists will be fairly huge, and we'll improve this later.



Mock-up for the view/edit page:


(ignore the tickboxes - that's kanbantool stuff)



 

 
 
 
 
 
 


[Save]
tasks.size_estimate_description: 1.0 - the same as most of other tasks

tasks.name: No Promo In Category Message
tasks.description:
If there is no promo for a category in our promo section, we need a message. I'm suggesting we use the same element we use when theres no sports. (See here https://www.sportsinteraction.com/hockey/nhl-betting-lines/)


This is dynamic so if there is no casino promos, same message with changed icon / category name.


For the Casino message 'Sports' will be replaced with 'Casino' but I will post the exact text when the translations come back.


The icon to use for sports is called 'Sports'

The icon to use for casino is called 'Casino'

The icon to use for all is called 'All-sports'

The colour of these is specified in the Figma.

These are in the icons font.


See mock-up here. 

https://www.figma.com/file/9xGRlptCDcSIE282iVqQK6/No-Promo?node-id=0%3A1


Here is the text: (EN in green FR in blue)

There are no promotions available for you right now. Check back soon!

   Il n'y a pas de promotions disponibles pour vous pour le moment.

   Revenez bientôt!

There are no sports available for you right now. Check back soon!

   Il n'y a pas de promotions sportives disponibles pour vous pour

   le moment. Revenez bientôt!

There are no casino promotions available for you right now. Check back soon!

   Il n'y a pas de promotions de Casino disponibles pour vous pour

   le moment. Revenez bientôt!
tasks.size_estimate_description: 1.0 - the same as most of other tasks

tasks.name: Set up LM email for AP postponed matches
tasks.description:
Problem: 

When a match is postponed it doesn't get graded so LM have to do it manually. 


This happens quiet a bit for eSports matches (especially e-soccer) and there's no reliable source for those postponements and cancellations.  Leaving customers and their funds in limbo for significant lengths of time as we await a reliable result.



Solution: 

Send an email to linemanegement@sportsinteractioon.com with the match name, and start time notifying them that the match has been "Postponed" or "Cancelled" so LM can manually void those bets in a timely manner for the customers.


Make sure it applies to all sports/games on the BR feed


Tech Note:

https://docs.betradar.com/display/BD/UOF+-+Bet+settlement
Relevant match statuses:
(“cancelled", “postponed”).

tasks.name: Handling bonuses that expire during a player's session
tasks.description:
When a promo becomes expired and client hasn't seen it yet, we should not include it in the count of unseen promos anymore.


Scenarios


GIVEN a player with 2 unseen casino bonus cards

WHEN one of the cards are expired

THEN player sees a red dot with count 1 beside the Promos menu item


GIVEN a player with 1 unseen casino bonus card

WHEN player logs in

THEN player sees a red dot with count 1 beside the Promos menu item (without going to promos page)

WHEN player uses the bonus through playing a game

AND later goes to the websites home page again

THEN player sees no red dot beside the Promos menu item
tasks.block_reason: wait till after we get A/B tests before implementing this
